This app requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'. Location permission is required for this app. Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map. // Đang kết nối với thiết bị EspTouch failed BSSID = %1$s, InetAddress = %2$s EspTouch Create EspTouch task failed, the EspTouch port could be used by other thread Please connect Wi-Fi first.
